requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or Radeon RX Vega 56 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

results.name: PLAY because you dont have other things to do
